column1: So, anyway, I passed him a note, but then Johnny...
It's just so embarrassing. What if the other girls find out my mother is in rehab?
Principal, you've gotta send help to the playground! They're about to beat up that new kid!
Hey guys.  Thanks. Support your team? Thank you. Hey guys. Did you get one of these?  Hope you can make it.
The girls volleyball team has a big game tonight and we're just asking for people to come cheer us on.
Please don't tell them that we're hiding here.
